Violation_Type: Procedural delay in processing permanent residence application
Legal_Issue: Entitlement to a mandamus order for delayed permanent residence application
Application_Facts: Applicant's application delayed due to security inquiries and marital status uncertainties; cessation application filed after mandamus request
Court_Ruling: Application dismissed; no mandamus order granted
Defendant_Behavior: Delayed processing due to security checks and marital status verification
Legal_Standard: Mandamus requires a clear public duty, unreasonable delay, and no alternative remedy
Assessment_Factor: Presence of ongoing cessation application under subsection 21(3)
Applicable_Legislation: Subsection 21(3) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Procedural_Issue: Cessation application filed subsequent to mandamus application
Evidence_Used: Security inquiry records, marital status documentation
Legal_Provision_Cited: Subsection 21(3), Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Application_Basis: Permanent residence application pending during cessation process
Evidence_Assessed: Security concerns and marital status verification delays
Relief_Sought: Compulsion of immigration authorities to decide residence application
Harm_Assessment: Delay in resolution of permanent residence status
Cause_Description: Delayed processing due to security checks and marital status issues
Evidence_Handling: Considered in context of national security and statutory restrictions
Legal_Provision_Violated: None found; delay justified under statutory framework
Residency_Compliance: Application compliance affected by pending cessation
Legal_Provision: Subsection 21(3), Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Evidence_Assessment: Delays partially justified by legitimate security inquiries
Decision_Rationale: Cessation application legally precludes approval of permanent residence under subsection 21(3)
Decision_Making_Body: Federal Court or equivalent reviewing mandamus petition
Legal_Standard_Applied: Requirements for issuing a writ of mandamus
